#summary Downloading the Google Search Appliance Connector for Documentum
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured
*Downloading the Google Search Appliance Connector for Documentum*

For customers who qualify for enterprise-level support, Google
provides support for the Google Search Appliance Connectors. You can
go to the [http://www.google.com/work/portal Google for Work Support Portal]
to download supported versions of the connector or contact Google for Work 
Support.

To download installers for the Google Search Appliance Connectors, see the
[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B8wJWld5GWGYVlpvSTB1RUF5dzg&usp=sharing&tid=0B8wJWld5GWGYcnNUSTlvSTBwekU#list installers folder] on Google Drive.

For unsupported builds, early access, or to download supported patches
as directed by Google for Work Support, see the [https://github.com/googlegsa/documentum.v3/releases Releases page] on !GitHub. For earlier versions, see the [http://code.google.com/p/google-enterprise-connector-dctm/downloads/list Downloads] page on this code site.

Google may not provide support for builds downloaded from !GitHub, the code sites, or the `unsupported` folders on Google Drive.
